Workspace.ItemGeneratorDescription: This generator allows you to easily create original items. Use your favorite designs to create acrylic stands, posters, message cards, and more. With intuitive controls, you can craft unique items that are truly your own.
Workspace.ModelUploadWarning: The large size of an uploaded 3D model may negatively impact the user experience.
Workspace.CreateAcrylicStand: Create your own acrylic stand with your favorite designs.
Workspace.CreatePoster: Create an original poster with captivating visuals.
Workspace.CreateMessageCard: Create a personalized message card with a special touch.
Workspace.CreateCanBadge: Create an original can badge. Ideal for promotions or as collectible items.
Workspace.Upload3DModel: Upload your 3D model and create a digital item.
Workspace.SelectPosterMaterial: Select the material for the poster.
Workspace.CropPosterMaterial: Crop the poster material as needed.
Workspace.SelectAcrylicStandBodyMaterial: Select the material for the acrylic stand body.
Workspace.AdjustBodyTilt: Adjust the tilt of the body by rotating it.
Workspace.SelectAcrylicStandBaseMaterial: Select the material for the acrylic stand base.
Workspace.SetBaseOrientation: Set the front and back of the base and adjust it by rotating.
Workspace.PlaceBodyOnBase: Place the body on the base. Move the rectangle labeled 'Acrylic plate' to set the placement.
Workspace.SelectKeychainDesign: Select the design for the acrylic keychain.
Workspace.SelectCanBadgeMaterial: Select the material for the Can Badge.
Workspace.CropBadge: Crop the can badge material as needed.
Workspace.SelectMessageCardSheetMaterial: Select the sheet material for the message card.
Workspace.SelectMessageCardTextMaterial: Select the text material for the message card.
Workspace.AdjustTextPosition: Adjust the position and size of the text.
Workspace.CombineSheetAndText: Combine the sheet and text to generate a single item.
Workspace.ConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
Workspace.DeleteOperationWarning: Performing the Delete operation will disable the ability to undo or redo any previous changes. Please confirm that you want to proceed.
Workspace.ConfirmResetSettings: Are you sure you want to reset the settings?
Workspace.Creator: Creator
Workspace.AdjustAcrylicRatio: You can adjust the ratio of the selected Acrylic Stand.
